title: (x) Band Logo for The Whitlams - Can anyone help out? - Gill Sans Ultra Bold {Akira}
content:
Hi there!

Just wondering if someone could tell me which typeface was used for "The Whitlams" in the image below. I'm also curious about the "Sydney Symphony" logo in the top left corner and the yellow text "and the Sydney Symphony" if they could be ID'ed as well, but "The Whitlams" is the most important.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202114250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whitlams_5478.JPG)

Thanks in advance for any help you can give! :D
author: klokwerk

comments.content: Thank you for the identification. It's sad that I don't know these basic typeface IDs, I know. Thanks again. :)
